definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: For this reason, the researches on opening up wasteland were always hot.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，有關屯墾的研究歷來較爲活躍。

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place for artists and poets.
sentences.chinese: 泰山歷來是畫家騷客所鍾情的聚集地。

sentences.english: Taihu Basin was always one of the most developed districts in China.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域歷來是我國經濟比較發達地區之一。

sentences.english: The first woman in Malaysia to head a university, Tan Sri Ng was the founding President of Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman (UTAR).
sentences.chinese: 黃博士是馬來西亞大學歷來第一位女性校長。

sentences.english: They compiled thousands of case history to prove the relationship between smoking and cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他們收集了數以千計的病歷來證明吸菸與癌症的關係。

sentences.english: The excavation of inclined shaft was always difficult in the construction of Pumped-Storage Power Station.
sentences.chinese: 在抽水蓄能電站中斜井開挖施工歷來是一個難點。

sentences.english: From the novel to the film is aways the hot topic.
sentences.chinese: 從小說到電影的藝術轉換，歷來是討論的熱題。

sentences.english: IAB investigators target those offenses that have been traditionally corruption-prone.
sentences.chinese: 內勤局調查員會鎖定歷來容易導致腐敗的違法行爲。

sentences.english: Wealth creates what has historically been the social backbone of democracy: a middle class.
sentences.chinese: 財富創造了歷來就是民主的社會支柱的中產階級。

sentences.english: On the whole, the spatial relationship is the key of the western art history.
sentences.chinese: 縱觀西方美術史，空間關係歷來是畫面關係的重點。

sentences.english: Rajasthan has traditionally been the area of the country with the most camels.
sentences.chinese: 拉賈斯坦邦歷來是印度駱駝數量最多的地區。

sentences.english: As a means of figurative speech, repetition of words is often employed by poets.
sentences.chinese: 疊字作爲一種修辭手段，歷來爲詩人廣用。

sentences.english: Liang Ke Shuo" of Dengxi used to be regarded as a sophism."
sentences.chinese: 鄧析的“兩可說”歷來被視爲是詭辯。

sentences.english: Images are agood way to catch a visitors attention.
sentences.chinese: 圖像歷來是吸引眼球的不二法門。

sentences.english: Railway passenger station always put the passenger flow line as the focus of design ideas.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路客運站歷來把旅客流線作爲其設計構思的重點。

sentences.english: The researchers of Mohism uphold their own core theory since the subject of Mohism came into being.
sentences.chinese: 歷來的墨學研究者各自提出了自己的核心論。
